newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: CRICKET-SRI LANKA WIN TOSS, BAT AGAINST PAKISTAN.
newsitem.headline: CRICKET-SRI LANKA WIN TOSS, BAT AGAINST PAKISTAN.

text.p: Sri Lanka won the toss and decided to bat against Pakistan in the first of two tests starting in Colombo on Saturday.

Sri Lanka - Arjuna Ranatunga (Captain), Aravinda de Silva, Sanath Jayasuriya, Russel Arnold, Marvan Atapattu, Hashan Tillekeratne, Romesh Kaluwitharana, Chaminda Vaas, Nuwan Zoysa, Muthiah Muralitharan, Kumar Dharmasena.
Pakistan - Rameez Raja (Captain), Salim Elahi, Asif Mujtaba, Salim Malik, Inzamam-ul-Haq, Moin Khan, Saqlain Mushtaq, Shahid Nazir, Mohammad Zahid, Mushtaq Ahmed and Ijaz Ahmed
Umpires: David Shepherd (England) and Udaya Wickremasinghe (Sri Lanka).
